medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Abdominal pain began suddenly 12 hours ago after eating dinner, associated with fever and chills. Patient experienced several episodes of non-bloody diarrhea since onset without improvement in pain. No nausea or vomiting reported, but bloating and anorexia occurred since the pain began.
medical_history.past_medical_history: PCOS; history of L ovarian torsion s/p lap detorsion one year ago; previous laparoscopic L ovarian cyst removal
medical_history.family_history: No history of IBD or GI malignancy.
